plot: Impoverished people find their wishes fulfilled at a Murugan/Shivji Mandir, while police suspect a CBI Officer of being a modern day Robin Hood.
title: Kanthaswamy

plot_en: Impoverished people find their wishes fulfilled at a Murugan/Shivji Mandir, while police suspect a CBI Officer of being a modern day Robin Hood.
